pageContext.claim: “And, you know, historically, I guess there's never really been a businessman or businessperson elected president. It's always been a general or a politician. Throughout history it's always been a general -- you had to be a general -- but mostly it was politicians. You never had a businessman.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump is the first president that never served in the military, elected public office or government before becoming taking office. While the vast majority of former presidents were lawyers by profession, several, including Harry Truman, George H.W. Bush and George W. Bush, worked in business.
